pages.title: 白钩蛱蝶
pages.text: 钩蛱蝶属的白钩蛱蝶，是属于构架蝶科食物通才($(o)杂食性$()) butterfly species belonging to the family Nymphalidae.$(br2)The angular notches on the edges of the forewings are characteristic of the genus Polygonia, which is why species in the genus are commonly referred to as anglewing butterflies.

pages.title: 白钩蛱蝶
pages.text: 相对大小：★★☆☆☆$(br2)始终活动$(br2)2种肤色$(br2)最喜欢的食物：minecraft:dandelion$(br2)种类数量：4$(br2)成长时间：无天数
